headline: Apache Corporation Tree Grant Program Opens U.S. Applications for 2025-2026 Planting Season
summary: HOUSTON, May 14, 2025 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Apache Corporation, a subsidiary of APA Corporation (Nasdaq: APA), today announced the opening of applications for the Apache Corporation Tree Grant Program’s 2025-2026 planting season. To receive tree grants, applicants must be based in the United States. Since 2005, the program has partnered with more than 1,000 nonprofit organizations and government agencies across the company’s U.S. operating areas. In 2023, the program surpassed the significant mile

To receive tree grants, applicants must be based in the United States.
